Previous: Prerequisites Up: Prerequisites Next: Setup

In this Tutorial we will develop an application for a petclinic. In this application pet-owners shall be able to manage their pets and their pet's visits at veterinarians (vets).

Vets shall be able to administrate their patients (which are the pets) and the visits of the pets.

And these are the concrete requirements:

  1. Owners of pets must be able to register themself
  2. Owners of pets must be able to add and edit their pets
  3. Owners of pets must be able to make appointments for visits (In order to do this, they have to know the vets and their specialties)
  4. Vets must be able to maintain their visits, add comments and filter by owner or pet.
